mission_and_vision.mission: To help establish links between prospective employers and East West University students and graduates, serving as a prime service provider in human resource and career development.
objectives: Help the career search and job placement process.
Provide information and guidance for higher study opportunities.
Foster career development action plans and enhance personal qualities.
Assist students in reaching their full potential, promoting social and intellectual growth.

career_development_and_advisory: Career Counseling and Advisory Services for students and graduates.
Workshops on professional skills (e.g., CV & Cover Letter writing, Corporate Grooming).
Training sessions and Seminars (e.g., Career Talk sessions, Etiquette, Personal Behavior and Professionalism).
Providing career tips and development resources.
Connecting academic majors to career paths.
employment_and_networking: Organizing Job Fairs (e.g., Fall Career Fair, Winter Career Fair).
Maintaining Job Seeker Registration and Graduates' Profile Registration databases (EWU Graduates' Profile).
Liaison with the Department of Students' Welfare and student welfare clubs.

mental_wellbeing_service.description: Provides professional psychological counseling services to students to support their mental well-being, manage psychological stress, overcome difficulties in personal and family relationships, and address other social disorders.
